title: BIT Mesra ECE Vs Pes CSE vs Msrit CSE vs Rvce ECE
content: Same as title,I am very confused.I have heard that UG degree matters a lot during MBA/MS,Please help me which one will be better and which college relatively has a better alumni network and recognised more in India as well all over the world?I don't have any particular inclination towards ECE or CSE.

comments.body:
> I have heard that UG degree matters a lot during MBA/MS

Yes. 

> I don't have any particular inclination towards ECE or CSE.

Which is why you need to figure this out for yourself first, before you ask for suggestions on which college is better. Because it's not an objective question, but rather, which one is better for *you*. 

> which college relatively has a better alumni network and recognised more in India as well all over the world?

None of those colleges have any sort of international brand. They're all equal to the admission committees.

Choose btw PES CSE and RV ECE, both are equally great....both in terms of placements as well as for masters...what's your interest see and go....I chose PES CSE as i like cs (RV ECE was aukaat se bahar), while my close friend wanted to go to RV only, and he likes electronics....so hope you get your answer....
